entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Local blowing snow this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 50 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
